response.original_title: Psychopathic Tendencies: Sick, Twisted, Perverse & Sadistic Tales
response.overview: Psychopaths and Maniacs Galore! If you've seen "Psychopaths" or "Snuff Film," you've seen the work of Jason Impey - the notorious UK filmmaker whose twisted and bizarre films follow demented, perverse sickos on the run from the police for various crimes of rape, torture and murder. In this collection, one victim after another suffers at the hands of deranged individuals.
response.title: Psychopathic Tendencies: Sick, Twisted, Perverse & Sadistic Tales
